Hello there 👋 ! I am Ziqi Huang. I am passionate about HCI, signal processing and etc.. If you’re interested in my work or have ideas for collaboration, I’d love to hear from you. Feel free to reach out(ziqi.huang@tecnico.ulisboa.pt)
